title: About | Educational Nonprofit Coalition
main_content: About This website was inspired by Amy's Harvard Phillips Brooks House Service Starts with Summer website project, Jessica Wu's College Essay writing and SAT tutoring classes, and Lucas Chu's links, with inspiration from A2C subreddit and the College Admissions Hub discord server. Feel free to email me at lucaschu@college.harvard.edu to ask a question, add a link, or provide feedback.
